thig5.12:1.4: I did not acquire cloth or food.
thig5.12:2.1: Having taken bowl and walking stick,
thig5.12:2.2: I went for alms from family to family.
thig5.12:3.4: 'I want to go forth into homelessness.'
thig5.12:4.2: Paṭācārā allowed me to go forth.
thig5.12:4.4: she urged me to the highest aim.
thig5.12:5.3: Any advice from Ayye was not useless,
thig5.12:5.4: possessing three superhuman knowledges, free from corruptions."
thig5.12:7.1: The Chapter of the Fives is finished.
